description:
Yunan is one of the four Magi in the current era, known as the Wandering Magi, and is the Guardian of the Great Rift. He was the one that advised http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad] to clear the 1st dungeon, http://anidb.net/ch80566 [Baal], stating it would give him the power he sought.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Yunan
